unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Give Diwali a Jhatka!**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Give Diwali a Jhatka!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, looks like that Diwali bonus might need to stretch a little further! Gas cylinder prices just saw another hike, leaving many kitchens feeling the pinch.
normalised: Hey folks, looks like that Diwali bonus might need to stretch a little further! Gas cylinder prices just saw another hike, leaving many kitchens feeling the pinch.

unnormalised: A standard 14.2 kg LPG cylinder will now cost Rs. 1150 in Delhi, up from Rs. 1100 last month. Ouch! Experts at IIM-Ahmedabad are saying global crude oil prices and the rising dollar are to blame, but that doesn't make the chai any cheaper.
normalised: A standard fourteen point two kilogram L P G cylinder will now cost rupees one thousand one hundred and fifty in Delhi, up from rupees one thousand one hundred last month. Ouch! Experts at I I M-Ahmedabad are saying global crude oil prices and the rising dollar are to blame, but that doesn't make the chai any cheaper.

unnormalised: "It's getting tough to manage the household budget," says Mrs. Sharma from Lucknow, a sentiment echoed by many. Dr. Patel from ONGC says the government might consider further subsidies, but no promises yet.
normalised: "It's getting tough to manage the household budget," says Missus Sharma from Lucknow, a sentiment echoed by many. Doctor Patel from O N G C says the government might consider further subsidies, but no promises yet.

unnormalised: This price jump is especially hard on those using Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana cylinders. Folks are saying, "Is this the acche din we were promised?"
normalised: This price jump is especially hard on those using Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana cylinders. Folks are saying, "Is this the acche din we were promised?"

unnormalised: On a brighter note, maybe this is a good time to invest in that solar cooker you've been eyeing? Think of all that extra space in your 500 sq ft Mumbai apartment! Stay tuned for more updates on the energy front.
normalised: On a brighter note, maybe this is a good time to invest in that solar cooker you've been eyeing? Think of all that extra space in your five hundred square feet Mumbai apartment! Stay tuned for more updates on the energy front.
